tempList - Variable in class model.MouseWatcher
 
tempList - Variable in class view.LayerManager
A list to assist in the quick removal of Components
temporaryAdd(ClickableComponent) - Method in class model.MouseWatcher
Adds a Component which will later be removed from the MouseWatcher
temporaryAdd(Component, int) - Method in class view.LayerManager
Adds a Component which will later be removed
texture - Variable in class component.Component
The visual appearance of the component (constructed as null if this Component is animated)
thread - Variable in class model.Game
The separate Thread on which this game runs
tick() - Method in class model.Game
Calculate the internal state of the game
tick() - Method in class model.TileManager
Calculates the state of every Tile on screen and adjusts accordingly
tick() - Method in class state.GameState.Hotbar
Calculate the state of the Hotbar
tick() - Method in class state.GameState
 
tick() - Method in class state.MenuState
 
tick() - Method in class state.SettingsState
 
tick() - Method in class state.State
Calculates the state of all assets in the State (non-visible)
Tile - Class in component
A class representing a Tile drawn on the screen.
Tile(BufferedImage, BufferedImage, boolean, double, boolean, int, int) - Constructor for class component.Tile
Constructs a new Tile with the given states
Tile.Crystal - Class in component
A class for the Crystal at the top of the tower
Tile.DirtTile - Class in component
A class for dirt.
Tile.GrassTile - Class in component
A class for grass.
Tile.LogTile - Class in component
A class for logs.
Tile.ScaffoldTile - Class in component
As of now, the only Tile that can collapse under the weight of other tiles
Tile.StoneTile - Class in component
A class for stone.
TILE_GRID_HEIGHT - Static variable in class model.TileManager
The width (in Tiles) of the screen
TILE_GRID_WIDTH - Static variable in class model.TileManager
The width (in Tiles) of the screen
TileGrid(int, int) - Constructor for class model.TileManager.TileGrid
Constructs a new TileGrid
TileManager - Class in model
A class which manages the behavior of Tiles in the game Tile Assets are loaded in this class instead of in Assets for better organization Tile behavior is handled in this class instead of in the GameState class because the TileManager contains data about every Tile
TileManager() - Constructor for class model.TileManager
Constructs a new TileManager
tileManager - Variable in class state.GameState
See TileManager
TileManager.TileGrid - Class in model
A 30x20 grid of Tiles.
tileSheet - Static variable in class component.Tile
The SpriteSheet of textures for tiles that are editable (in the range of the tower)
title - Variable in class model.Game
The title for the Display
title - Variable in class view.Display
The title for the JFrame
TOP - Static variable in class component.Tile
The index in the neighbors array of the Tile above this one
